sentences.en: a popular women’s magazine
sentences.cn: 一本受欢迎的女性杂志

sentences.en: At a table inside, a man and woman were awaiting her.
sentences.cn: 在里面的一张桌子旁,一男一女正等着她.

sentences.en: Carol is a tall, dark, Latin type of woman.
sentences.cn: 卡萝尔身材高大，黑发棕肤，是个有着拉丁风情的女子。

sentences.en: He was charged with the kidnap of a 25 year-old woman.
sentences.cn: 他被指控绑架一名25岁的女子。

sentences.en: I was talking to a woman I met on the flight.
sentences.cn: 我正和一个在飞机上认识的女子交谈。

sentences.en: It's very difficult being a woman in motor racing.
sentences.cn: 做一名女赛车手很不容易。

sentences.en: Mainline feminism was arguing for the inherent beauty of the natural woman.
sentences.cn: 主流女权主义思想倡导女性天生的自然美。

sentences.en: Many men still have difficulty accepting a woman as a business partner.
sentences.cn: 许多男性仍然无法接受女性商业伙伴。

sentences.en: married women
sentences.cn: 已婚妇女

sentences.en: She has always been her own woman.
sentences.cn: 她一向很独立

sentences.en: She saw herself as a direct, no-nonsense modern woman.
sentences.cn: 她认为自己是个直截了当、不拖泥带水的现代女性。

sentences.en: She was a woman with extraordinary vibrancy and extraordinary knowledge.
sentences.cn: 她是一位充满活力、博学多识的女子。

sentences.en: She was the only woman in Shell's legal department.
sentences.cn: 她是壳牌公司法律事务部唯一的女性。

sentences.en: Some men are flattered by the attentions of a young woman.
sentences.cn: 年轻女性的倾心会使一些男人飘飘然起来。

sentences.en: Susan'sa very bright and intelligent woman who knows her own mind.
sentences.cn: 苏珊是个非常聪明、有主见的女子。

sentences.en: The driver was a trim young woman of perhaps thirty.
sentences.cn: 司机是个大约30岁的身材苗条的年轻女子。

sentences.en: The woman denied that she had neglected her child.
sentences.cn: 那位女士否认疏于照管自己的孩子。

sentences.en: These days work plays an important part in a single woman's life.
sentences.cn: 现在，工作在单身女性的生活中起着重要作用。

sentences.en: This woman wore seamed nylons and kept smoothing her skirt.
sentences.cn: 这个女士穿着长筒尼龙缝袜，不停地把裙子弄平整。

sentences.en: When a woman is pregnant, the levels of hormones in her body change.
sentences.cn: 女人怀孕时，体内的荷尔蒙水平会发生变化。

sentences.en: you're mistaken, my good woman.
sentences.cn: 你错了，女人。

words.tran_cn: 女子气的；柔弱的；适于女子的
像女人的；有女子气质的
像女人地；适合于妇女地
女人；女人气质；女子成年期
玩弄女性者；沉溺于女色的人

phrases.tran_cn: 在判断或行动上独立的女人
清洁房间的女仆（等于cleaning lady）
n. 小妇人；（前面与the连用）妻子
(英，旧)女人（表示称呼女子的傲慢说法）
[口]老婆；[口]母亲；婆婆妈妈的人；挑剔而胆小的人
小女人（表示称呼妻子的傲慢说法）
女人对女人，（两个女人间）直接坦白的方式
神奇女侠；神力女超人；神奇女郎（电视剧）
